name: Rune Mysteries
Start point: Duke Horacio on the 1st floor[UK]2nd floor[US] of Lumbridge Castle.
Description: The Duke of Lumbridge has discovered a strange talisman. He asks you to take it to the Wizards' Tower south of Draynor Village for research. This quest unlocks the Runecrafting skill.
Recommended: Fast travel to Draynor Village (Amulet of glory)

substeps: Speak to Duke Horacio on the 1st floor[UK]2nd floor[US] of Lumbridge Castle.
He will give you an Air talisman and ask you to take it to the Archmage Sedridor.
Travel to the Wizards' Tower, south of Draynor Village.
Go down the ladder to the basement.
Speak to Sedridor. He will take the Air talisman and give you a Research package.
Go to the rune shop in the north-eastern part of Varrock (south of the east bank).
Give him the Research package. He will give you Research notes.
Return to Sedridor in the basement of the Wizards' Tower.
Talk to him again to finish the quest.
